summary: A doctor repairs a female inmate's disfigured face to match the lovely woman who left him, and marries her, only to find out how abusive she is.
cast: Paul Henreid|Lizabeth Scott|Andr√© Morell|Mary Mackenzie|John Wood|Susan Stephen|Arnold Ridley|Cyril Smith|Diana Beaumont|Terence O'Regan|Russell Napier|Ambrosine Phillpotts|Everley Gregg|Alexis France|John Bull|Richard Wattis|Dorothy Bramhall|Janet Burnell|Grace Gavin|William Murray|John Warren|Anna Turner|Hal Osmond|Philip Vickers|James Valentine|Howard Douglas|Robert Brooks Turner|Jack Arrow|Frank Hawkins|Fletcher Lightfoot|John Lynn|Bartlett Mullins|Jack Parnell|Frank Schock|Ronnie Scott|Ben Williams
title: Cara robada (Stolen Face)
